name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Gift Broker Wish List Button

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a product from the current page to a Wish List hosted by the Gift Broker

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Gift Broker Wish List button will help you add products to your Wish Lists hosted on giftbroker.com from any website you visit. Simply click the Gift Broker button and youâ€™ll be taken to your account where you can edit or update product information before saving an item to your list.

Gift Broker is an online Wish List Service that allows you to receive gifts without disclosing your shipping address. Protect your privacy. Let us do the work! Simply register for an account, create a wish list, and share with friends and family via social media, email or your website. Receive updates when an item is purchased from your wish list and remain confident that we will never share your address with anyone.
